scripts.generate-deployment: rm -rf build && mkdir -p build/config && ./mvnw package && cp target/dispatcher-runner.jar build/ && cp deploy/application.properties build/config/ && cp src/main/resources/dispatchSolverConfig-v1.xml build/config/
scripts.build: yarn generate-deployment && cd build && zip -FSrq dispatcher.zip *
scripts.build:ec2: sudo rm -rf build && mkdir -p build/config && ./mvnw package && cp target/dispatcher-runner.jar build/ && cp src/main/resources/application.properties build/config/ && cp src/main/resources/dispatchSolverConfig-v1.xml build/
scripts.redeploy: docker kill dispatcher && yarn build:docker && yarn run:docker:ec2
